level.heading: SUSPENSION OR REVOCATION OF APPROVAL (ยง 31-407)

level.text: The approval of an MTS may be suspended or revoked by the Office with reasonable notice and an opportunity to be heard if the Office learns that the MTS or the associated owners or operators using are not it in substantial compliance with this title, or if that the MTS is being used in a manner that poses a significant threat to passenger or operator safety, or consumer protection.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 6993 (May 17, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 10975 (July 26, 2013).
